i1.name: Damnation
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, large {{tip|minion|minions}} and large {{tip|monster|monsters}} that die near '''Thresh''' drop a ''Soul'' for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 ''Souls'' instead. Small minions and lesser monsters have a {{fd|33.{{recurring|33}}}}% chance to drop a ''Soul''.

'''Thresh''' autonomously collects ''Souls'' near him or his {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh|lantern}}. ''Souls'' are visible to allies and only become visible to enemies if their team has {{tip|sight}} of '''Thresh'''.
Each collected ''Soul'' grants '''Thresh''' {{sti|ap|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' ability power}}}} and {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' armor}}}}.
i1.notes:
* ''Souls'' grants a small amount of {{tip|sight}} around itself.
* The probability for ''souls'' dropping from small minions and monster on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} starts at 33% but adjusts dynamically to match the expected quota of ''souls'' dropped (lowers if above, rises if below, remains if even). ''Souls'' collected are not considered when adjusting the probability.
* The maximum amount of ''souls'' '''Thresh''' can collect is 999,999, granting him {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' ability power}} and {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' armor}} ({{fd|99.99}}% damage reduction, reduced to {{fd|99.98}}% when hit by {{ii|Last Whisper}}).
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} drop a soul each (sometimes the icy ghosts from {{iis|Twin Shadows}} active will drop one each after reaching their targets).

q1.name: Death Sentence
description: {{sbc|First Cast - Death Sentence:}} '''Thresh''' throws out his scythe in the target direction. '''Thresh''' is {{tip|entangle|entangled}} while the scythe is in flight.

The scythe stops with the first enemy it hits, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, while also forming a tether between '''Thresh''' and them for the duration. Hitting an enemy reduces ''Death Sentence's'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 3 seconds.

While the tether persists, '''Thresh''' is {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} and periodically tugs at his scythe's chain, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} the target a short distance towards himself. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, or instantly upon hitting a minion or monster, '''Thresh''' can cast {{ai|Death Leap|Thresh}}.
{{sbc|Second Cast - Death Leap:}} '''Thresh''' {{tip|dashes}} to the tethered enemy, removing the {{tip|stun}} but becoming able to attack again.
q1.notes:
* ''Thresh'' will [http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=33837947#post33837947 not face in the target direction] during ''Death Sentence's'' cast animation (only after the projectile starts traveling).
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} only the second cast is disabled.
* ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} duration is reduced by {{tip|tenacity}} while the [[tether]] will persist for the full duration (unless broken by {{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{ii|Mikael's Crucible}}, {{si|Cleanse}}, or certain [[Champion ability|abilities]]).
** Targets affected by {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} will not be {{tip|stun|stunned}} or {{tip|airborne|pulled}} at when hit ('''Thresh''' will not tug at his target even if {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} wears off before ''Death Sentence'' ends).
** ''Death Sentence's'' tether will not be broken by becoming {{tip|untargetable}}.
** ''Death Sentence's'' effects will persist if '''Thresh''' dies before the duration ends.

w1.name: Dark Passage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws his lantern to the target location for 6 seconds or until he moves too far away from it, {{tip|sight|revealing}} its surroundings.

'''Thresh''' and the first allied champion to come near the lantern is {{tip|shield|shielded}} for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, {{tip|dash|dashing}} to '''Thresh's''' current location and gaining the shield.
An ally cannot select the lantern while {{tip|silence|silenced}}, {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}.
w1.notes:
* Allies can pick up the lantern through small walls if its grab radius allows it.
* ''Thresh'' cannot grab the lantern but can shield himself if he walks near it.
* The lantern is considered a unit and can be targeted by {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, and {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}.
* The lantern's duration and maximum leash range are each displayed as a circle on the ground.

e1.name: Flay
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Thresh's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, with the {{sti|AD|{{as|AD}}}} ratio increasing based on the time spent not attacking enemy or neutral units.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' sweeps his chain around him and in a broad line towards the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them in the chain's direction, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them afterwards for 1 second.

r1.name: The Box
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' surrounds himself with 5 spectral walls, each lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 99% for 2 seconds.
Enemy champions hitting any wall beyond the first take no damage and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for only 1 second.
